data.text: @nadiazaman__ Kenapa tak delete lagi? Memang tak takut or rasa bersalah ke kalau orang lain mati from liver toxicity sebab advice salah macam ni ke?
@nadiazaman__ Hang in there Nad. If u need any help, wassap me, 0193198057

@nadiazaman__ So kalau suhu tak turun for 2 days, we’re supposed to ingest 12g of paracetamol in a span of 48 hours? Camtu? Jangan la dok bagi advice macam ni if you’re not a professional. Ppl take it as it is on social media. Be accountable. Blood will be on yr hands if people follow blindly.

@nadiazaman__ You mean this? Downgrade to.. paracetamol still?? Did you mention downgrading also means reducing the dose and frequency? I don’t think so?? DELETE. Multiple healthcare professionals are already advising you to delete, tell me why you don’t want to delete then I’ll leave you be. https://t.co/ZHexufWc86

@rrrrdn_ U don’t understand what im trying to explain in 1st post, my temp is spike high, its normal to take 2 tablets pcm every 4 hours sampai suhu turun. Did I mentioned i still continued to take same dosage every 4h? No. I said downgrade bergantung pd symptoms.
@nadiazaman__ You yourself mentioned 4 jam sekali 2 biji. Unless you live in a world where 24 hours does not exist, that’s 6g a day. https://t.co/1jHkJXIe92

@nadiazaman__ And yes I’ve just recently recovered from covid myself. Thank you for asking. Please delete your tweet which clearly states something else. Brain fog or not, delete for the sake of public health

@rrrrdn_ Why is it dangerous? Have you ever suffered from covid? Its normal even hospital used pcm to treat covid mild symptoms, even if you go to CAC they also gv you pcm. Adults can take a max eight 500mg tablets (in total) in 24 hours. at least 4 hours between doses.
@nadiazaman__ Delete la tweet paracetamol tu. It’s very dangerous pls we are all begging you from the healthcare side. I’m sure you don’t want blood on your hands, so please.
